title: Sonny Terry: shoutin' the blues
brief_description: Blind blues musician, Sonny Terry, performs a highly innovative piece on the harmonica. Filmed and recorded at the Broadway Motel, Oakland, California in 1969. (A useful compliment to ‘Chicago Blues’ title code: 507696)
